languages.text: "Ты сам предложил мне подставной суд над Иремерисс. Обещал, каким бы ни был процесс, приговорить ее именем Черного сердца — волей, над которой стоит только слово самого Векта. Ты предоставил мне самому подготовить сцену..." {n}Голос Маражая дрожит от ярости и восхищения.{/n} "А затем озвучил приговор, лишив Опустошительную бурю дракона и продемонстрировав другим, что кабал совершил ошибку и ослабел".

"You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."
languages.original_text: "Ты сам предложил мне подставной суд над Иремерисс. Обещал, каким бы ни был процесс, приговорить ее именем Черного сердца — волей, над которой стоит только слово самого Векта. Ты предоставил мне самому подготовить сцену..." {n}Голос Маражая дрожит от ярости и восхищения.{/n} "А затем озвучил приговор, лишив Опустошительную бурю дракона и продемонстрировав другим, что кабал совершил ошибку и ослабел".

traits.locale_text: "You were the one to offer me a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart with the voice second to only to the voice of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you pronounced the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

languages.text: "Ihr habt vorgeschlagen, einen Schauprozess für Yremeryss abzuhalten. Ihr habt versprochen, sie im Namen des Schwarzen Herzens zu verurteilen, wie der Prozess auch ausgehen mochte. Weil nur die Stimme von Asdrubael Vect selbst mehr Gewicht hatte als die Eure. Ihr habt mich die Bühne mit meinen eigenen Händen bereiten lassen ..." {n}Marazhais Stimme zittert vor Bewunderung und Zorn.{/n} "Und dann habt Ihr das Urteil gefällt, habt dem Plündernden Sturm seinen Dracon genommen und den anderen gezeigt, dass die Kabale einen Fehler begangen hatte und schwach geworden war."
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vorgeschlagen, einen Schauprozess für Yremeryss abzuhalten. Ihr habt versprochen, sie im Namen des Schwarzen Herzens zu verurteilen, wie der Prozess auch ausgehen mochte. Weil nur die Stimme von Asdrubael Vect selbst mehr Gewicht hatte als die Eure. Ihr habt mich die Bühne mit meinen eigenen Händen bereiten lassen ..." {n}Marazhais Stimme zittert vor Bewunderung und Zorn.{/n} "Und dann habt Ihr das Urteil gefällt, habt dem Plündernden Sturm seinen Dracon genommen und den anderen gezeigt, dass die Kabale einen Fehler begangen hatte und schwach geworden war."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “是你提议举行内定好的审判，对付伊芮梅莉斯。你曾经答应过我，无论结果如何，你都会以黑心阴谋团的名义罢黜她，你的威望仅次于阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特本人。你利用我一手搭建起了舞台……”{n}玛拉斋的声音颤抖着，充满了钦佩与愤怒。{/n}“之后你做出了判决。你废黜了狂风阴谋团的裁决官，让所有人看到狂风阴谋团犯下了大错，变得软弱无能。”
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: “是你提议举行内定好的审判，对付伊芮梅莉斯。你曾经答应过我，无论结果如何，你都会以黑心阴谋团的名义罢黜她，你的威望仅次于阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特本人。你利用我一手搭建起了舞台……”{n}玛拉斋的声音颤抖着，充满了钦佩与愤怒。{/n}“之后你做出了判决。你废黜了狂风阴谋团的裁决官，让所有人看到狂风阴谋团犯下了大错，变得软弱无能。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « C'est vous qui avez suggéré d'organiser un faux procès pour Yremeryss. Quel que soit le résultat, vous avez promis de la condamner au nom du Cœur Noir, votre voix étant presque aussi importante que celle d'Asdrubael Vect lui-même. Vous m'avez laissé préparer le terrain... » {n}La voix de Marazhai vacille, autant de rage que d'admiration.{/n} « Et vous avez rendu le verdict, privant la Tempête ravageuse de son Dracon et dévoilant à tous que la Kabale avait fait une erreur et s'était affaiblie. »
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vous qui avez suggéré d'organiser un faux procès pour Yremeryss. Quel que soit le résultat, vous avez promis de la condamner au nom du Cœur Noir, votre voix étant presque aussi importante que celle d'Asdrubael Vect lui-même. Vous m'avez laissé préparer le terrain... » {n}La voix de Marazhai vacille, autant de rage que d'admiration.{/n} « Et vous avez rendu le verdict, privant la Tempête ravageuse de son Dracon et dévoilant à tous que la Kabale avait fait une erreur et s'était affaiblie. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Fuiste tú quien sugirió celebrar un juicio falso para Yremeryss. Pasara lo que pasara, prometiste condenarla en nombre del Corazón Negro, con una voz cuya autoridad solo eclipsa la del propio Asdrubael Vect. Me dejaste organizar el escenario con mis propias manos...». {n}La voz de Marazhai tiembla con admiración y furia.{/n} «Y después dictaste sentencia, despojando a la Tempestad Asoladora de su Dracón y demostrando a los demás que la Kábala había cometido un error y se había vuelto débil».
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: «Fuiste tú quien sugirió celebrar un juicio falso para Yremeryss. Pasara lo que pasara, prometiste condenarla en nombre del Corazón Negro, con una voz cuya autoridad solo eclipsa la del propio Asdrubael Vect. Me dejaste organizar el escenario con mis propias manos...». {n}La voz de Marazhai tiembla con admiración y furia.{/n} «Y después dictaste sentencia, despojando a la Tempestad Asoladora de su Dracón y demostrando a los demás que la Kábala había cometido un error y se había vuelto débil».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「イレメリスのために偽の裁判をしようと持ちかけたのはお前だっただろう。結果はどうあれお前は黒き心臓の名において彼女を咎めるはずだった、アスドルバエル・ヴェクトの次に重要な声として。お前は俺様が自らお膳立てをするように仕向けたんだ…」{n}マラズハイの声は敬服と怒りを含んで小刻みに震えている。{/n}「そしてお前は判決を言い渡し、略奪の嵐をそのドラコンと引き離した。それにより、周りに対して陰謀団は過ちを犯し弱くなったと知らしめたんだ」
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: 「イレメリスのために偽の裁判をしようと持ちかけたのはお前だっただろう。結果はどうあれお前は黒き心臓の名において彼女を咎めるはずだった、アスドルバエル・ヴェクトの次に重要な声として。お前は俺様が自らお膳立てをするように仕向けたんだ…」{n}マラズハイの声は敬服と怒りを含んで小刻みに震えている。{/n}「そしてお前は判決を言い渡し、略奪の嵐をそのドラコンと引き離した。それにより、周りに対して陰謀団は過ちを犯し弱くなったと知らしめたんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Yremeryss için sahte bir mahkeme düzenleme önerisini sen sundun. Sonucu ne olursa olsun Kara Yürek adına onu suçlayacağına, kendi sesinin Asdrubael Vect'inkinden sonraki en güçlü ses olacağına söz verdin. Olaylara zemin hazırlamama müsaade ettin." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, hayranlık ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Mahkemenin kararı açıklandığında Müfteris Kasırga'yı Drakon'undan mahrum bıraktın, herkese Kabal'ın hata yaptığını ve zayıf düştüğünü gösterdin."
languages.original_text: "You were the one to suggest holding a fake trial for Yremeryss. No matter the outcome, you promised to condemn her in the name of the Black Heart, your voice being second only to that of Asdrubael Vect himself. You let me set the stage with my own hands..." {n}Marazhai's voice trembles with admiration and rage.{/n} "And then you delivered the verdict, stripping the Reaving Tempest of its Dracon and showing the others that the Kabal had made a mistake and grown weak."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss için sahte bir mahkeme düzenleme önerisi senden geldi. Sonucu ne olursa olsun Kara Yürek adına onu suçlayacağının, senin sesinin Asdrubael Vect'in kendisinden sonra ikinci en güçlü ses olacağının sözünü verdin. Sahneyi kendi ellerimle kurmamı sağladın." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi hayranlık ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Ve mahkeme sonucunu açıkladığında Müfteris Kasırga'yı Drakon'undan mahrum bıraktın ve diğerlerine, Kabal'ın bir hata yaptığını ve zayıf düştüğünü gösterdin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
